enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: Work of the Consultative Group of Experts
sentences: Brian Challenger (Antigua and Barbuda), Chair of the Consultative Group of Experts on non-Annex I national communications (CGE), reported on progress in implementing the CGE`s 2004-5 work programme.
The REPUBLIC OF KOREA offered to host a global workshop.
MOZAMBIQUE requested that a workshop be held in her country.
SWITZERLAND stressed the need for greater capacity within, and support to, the CGE.
Chair Stoycheva will prepare draft conclusions.
